name: Kartia: The Word of Fate
description: Kartia: The Word of Fate, known as Legend of Kartia in Europe and Rebus (レブス) in Japan, is a tactical role-playing game developed and published by Atlus for Sony's PlayStation video game console in 1998. It is best known for the work of its art designer, Yoshitaka Amano, who had previously worked on the Final Fantasy series. The game was re-released on the Japanese PlayStation Network in 2011.
